original_text: You come to worship me in my temple. But are you doing what I want? Did I ask you to march round the temple yards with all your animals?
korean_text: 너희가 내 앞에 보이러 오니 이것을 누가 너희에게 요구하였느냐 내 마당만 밟을 뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: You come to worship me in my temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나의 성전에서 나를 경배하러 온다.

sentences.original_text: But are you doing what I want?
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 내가 원하는 것을 하고 있는가?

sentences.original_text: Did I ask you to march round the temple yards
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 성전 마당을 돌라고 요청했더냐?
